column5: I just bought a HDS8 and I'm curious to hear what chip I should use in it. Gold, platinum? Maybe something new I should try? Let me know what you think Thanks
there is no best chip for a unit  there are best chips for areas or certain lakes  where are you going to use it
Erie mostly , niagara region, maybe a couple trips to st.clair
check this video  this guy is the best in ontario  watch video  7  about cards start about half way through      then  watch 8

Navionics + is the best deal really, you choose whatever lakes you want and download the freshest data available with 1 foot contours.  The video doesn't mention is because it wasn't out when it was made.  It saves buying multiple cards in many cases.  Also, some retailers have been telling people that they have issues with Navionics+ but the truth is that they have a whole bunch of Platinum and hotmaps cards in stock that they don't want to get stuck with.....I won't mention any names but it's a crock.
I have a Navionics plus for sale on Kijiji... New in the sealed package...

cool videos, got lost for over an hour in them! lol  Dudes pretty smart but a smart ass too!  I feel pretty safe saying that since he cant use a computer and wont see this lol  Would love to spend a day in his boat!   Edit:  Oh ya and I use Navionics + in my HDS units
Jeff swing down to Grimsby Tackle, Martin will be able to help you out
You should meet him in person then.  Similar god complex as to what most paramedics have LOL.

You go in and buy one from him and he will set it all up for you and if you don;t know anything about them he will even teach you how to use it, try that any where else... Joslyn knows his stuff sometimes better than the Sales people them self
I agree with G.mech I opted for navionics + and I like it so far. just choose what you want, download, and enjoy.
